layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x42
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x42
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x26
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x26
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x26 [color=#008000] [border: (3px solid #008000) (15px solid #008000)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (15,3) size 220x19
            text run at (15,3) width 220: "There should be no red on this page."
